page.title: 04CHELMARSH PRIMARY SCHOOL 2.
page.content:
We do a lot of project work including studies of pollution,rocks and fossils,glass and the Normans.We go out on lots of visits and then come back and find out more about the places we visit. We have some very nice reading books and interesting reference books for our projects.We sometimes watch and listen to the educational television and radio programmes.
We enjoy doing physical education and games and we have school teams for football,netball and athletics.We go swimming to St.Mary's school pool,Bridgnorth during the Summer term and this year all the juniors have learned to swim. This year there are 27 juniors and 14 Infants.
